entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
